original_body_lines: Justice W. M. N. P Iddawala has been appointed as the new Chairman of the Commission to Investigate Allegations of Bribery or Corruption (CIABOC).
Meanwhile, Chethiya Goonesekera and K. Bernard Rajapakse have been appointed as other members.
Accordingly, the relevant appointments, made by President Ranil Wickremeisnghe, will be effective from 01 January 2024, the President’s Media Division (PMD).
